class DatePickerBox

Detailed Description

The callback interface used to indicate the user is done filling in the date (they clicked on the 'Set' button).

The following example demonstrates how to use the IDialogOnDateSetListener. 

  //You need implement your owner OnDateSet Listener for DatePickerBox
  class MyDialogOnDateSetListener : public gaia::core::IDialogOnDateSetListener {
    public:
      MyDialogOnDateSetListener();
      virtual ~MyDialogOnDateSetListener();
      void onDateSet(int32_t year, int32_t monthOfYear, int32_t dayOfMonth);
  };

  void MyDialogOnDateSetListener::onDateSet(int32_t year, int32_t monthOfYear, int32_t dayOfMonth) {
    //When DatePickerBox date is set, it will notify.
    //Your Implementation
  }

  //In your DatePickerBox, just register the callback by registerOnDateSetListener
  gaia::core::DatePickerBox* dateBox = new gaia::core::DatePickerBox(Page);
  MyDialogOnDateSetListener* listener = new MyDialogOnDateSetListener();
  if (listener == NULL) {
    //DialogOnDateSetListener create failure!!
    return;
  }

  if (dateBox != NULL) {
    dateBox->registerOnDateSetListener(listener);
  }

int32_t  dayOfMonth

This method will be invoked when the DatePickerBox date is set.

Parameters:

dayOfMonthThe day that was set.
